Server.Model

Class User

  • java.lang.Object
    • CommonModel.Snapshot.BaseUser
      • CommonModel.Snapshot.CurrentUser
        • Server.Model.User
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FakeUser

    public class User
extends CurrentUser
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class is intended to represent the user in the server. In this class we will find all the information visible server side and only changed here. Otherwise, users will not be sent a copy of this in when it contains the Setter. Created by Emanuele on 11/05/2016.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
